name: Brain Link
description:
Two Androids, linked by a radio transmission, must find their way out of a maze without breaking their link.

Done during the Global Game Jam 2018. Requires 2 controllers to play.

Credits: 

Game Designer:

Pablo Nény

Programmers:

Nicolas Crête,

Maxim Cousineau,

Jorge Tomas Solano Bielen

Artists:

Valentin Leroy,

Dan Ravouna.
